Class ItemGui

    • net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<net.minecraft.item.Item>

          • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.ItemGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.item.Item>, IDynamicModelElement, IConfigurable<ItemConfig>, IConfigurableItem, IGuiContainerProvider, IGuiContainerProviderConfigurable

    public abstract class ItemGui
extends ConfigurableItem
implements IGuiContainerProviderConfigurable
    Configurable item that can show a GUI on right clicking.
